{"id":1230011664,"question_id":2869,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1712892259,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1230011664/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Non-decreasing Subarray From Two Arrays","memory":"58.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxNonDecreasingLength(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {\n        int n = nums1.length;\n        int[] dp1 = new int[n];\n        int[] dp2 = new int[n];\n        int max = 1; \n            \n        Arrays.fill(dp1, 1);\n        Arrays.fill(dp2, 1);\n\n        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){\n            if(nums1[i]>=nums1[i-1]){\n                dp1[i] = Math.max(dp1[i-1]+1, dp1[i]);\n            }\n            if(nums1[i]>=nums2[i-1]){\n                dp1[i] = Math.max(dp1[i], dp2[i-1]+1);\n            }\n\n            if(nums2[i]>=nums2[i-1]){\n                dp2[i] = Math.max(dp2[i-1]+1, dp2[i]);\n            }\n            if(nums2[i]>=nums1[i-1]){\n                dp2[i] = Math.max(dp2[i], dp1[i-1]+1);\n            }\n\n            max = Math.max(max, Math.max(dp1[i], dp2[i]));\n        } \n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-non-decreasing-subarray-from-two-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
